# Coordinate Systems Vista Graphics supports multiple coordinate systems for different use cases. ## Coordinate System Types - **Math Coordinates**: Origin at center, Y points up - **VID Coordinates**: Origin at top-left, Y points down - **Canvas Coordinates**: Pixel-based positioning ## Switching Coordinate Systems `draw canvas [ coord-system 'math box 0 0 100 100 coord-system 'vid box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## Default System VID coordinates are the default system in Vista. ## See Also - [Coordinate Systems Concepts](/wiki/graphics/concepts/coordinate-systems/) - Detailed overview - [Transforms](/wiki/graphics/transforms/) - Transform overview
